titleStmt.title: The case of Mr. Daniel Gwyn, agent for the Spanish pacquet-boats, in relation to Mr. John Russel's charge against him for pretended mismanagement in that imploy.
titleStmt.author: Gwyn, Daniel.

notesStmt.note: Ms. notes in margins; also, portion of text lined through, with handwritten comments below.
Imperfect: stained and creased with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Lincoln's Inn Library.
